title: Ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Malaysia 2024
yAxis: Ratio of government expenditure to GDP
summary: The statistic shows the Ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Malaysia from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 .
In 2018 , government expenditure in Malaysia amounted to about 22.7 % of the country 's gross domestic product .
gold: The statistic shows the ratio of government expenditure to gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Malaysia from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up to 2024.
In 2018 , government expenditure in Malaysia amounted to about 22.7 percent of the country 's gross domestic product .
